item.title: RFK Jr. hearing live updates: Democrats hammer RFK Jr. on vaccine comments, abortion

item.title: WATCH: F-35 jet crashes in Alaska, pilot ejects safely
item.description: Video circulating online shows the fighter jet crashing into flames at Eielson Air Force Base and the pilot parachuting to the ground.
